DOC.brief_summary: To collect confirmatory data support safety performance ArtVentive Medical Group Endoluminal Occlusion System .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Peripheral EOS Peripheral Embolization Treatment Rapidly OccluDe Venous Arterial BleEding
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , non-randomized , multi-center confirmatory observational study treatment subject need vascular occlusion follow condition : 1 . Stopping blood loss damage blood vessel traumatic vascular injury 2 . Hemorrhage cause neoplasia 3 . Neoplastic process ( tumor ) 4 . Gastrointestinal bleed 5 . Closing abnormal blood vessel supply vascular anomaly arteriovenous malformation arteriovenous fistula 6 . Interrupting blood supply organ part organ permanent devascularization 7 . Devascularization tissue involve neoplastic process either pre-operatively palliative measure 8 . Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt ( TIPS )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects age ≥18 ≤75 year . 2 . Subject target vessel 3.0 mm 12 mm diameter . 3 . Subject able willing comply study requirement , include require study followup visit . 4 . Subject subject 's legal representative inform nature study , agree participate sign consent form . In event emergency procedure subject and/or legal representative unable provide consent prior study enrollment , consent obtain early possible time follow procedure consent continue participate study . 1 . Subject know allergy iodinate contrast adequately premedicated . 2 . Subjects venography arteriography contraindicate . 3 . Subjects know hypersensitivity contraindication nickel nitinol . 4 . Subject pregnant breastfeeding . 5 . Any clinical evidence investigator feel would place subject increase risk deployment device .
